section.53: The Book of Paradise, its Description, its Bounties and its Inhabitants

hadiths.text: Ibn Umar reported that Allah's Apostle (ï·º) said:When a person dies, he is shown his seat morning and evening. If he is one amongst the inmates of Paradise (he is shown his seat) in Paradise and if he is one amongst the denizens of Hell-Fire (he is shown his seat) in the Hell-Fire. Then it is said to him: That is your seat where you would be sent on the Day of Resurrection
